Sentencas: This paper reports a method of performing electrophoretic deposition (EPD) on non-conducting substrates overcoming the requirement of a conducting substrate through the use of porous substrates.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of YSZ particles on non-conducting porous NiO-YSZ substrates for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: The conductivity of the substrate is therefore no longer a limiting factor in the application of EPD.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of YSZ particles on non-conducting porous NiO-YSZ substrates for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: This method is applicable to the fabrication of thick or thin layers of ceramic or metal for various applications.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of YSZ particles on non-conducting porous NiO-YSZ substrates for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: As an example, thin and dense yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) layers have been deposited on a non-conducting NiO-YSZ substrate by EPD from a non-aqueous suspension.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of YSZ particles on non-conducting porous NiO-YSZ substrates for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: A solid oxide fuel cell constructed on these sintered bilayers exhibited power densities of 384 and 611 mW/cm(2) at 750 degrees and 850 degrees C, respectively.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of YSZ particles on non-conducting porous NiO-YSZ substrates for solid oxide fuel cell applications
